block_comment: The block handles reset and write requests in a synchronous manner. On a clock's positive edge or a reset's negative edge, it checks if the reset is low. If it is, no operations are performed. Then, if the "W_valid" signal is high and "R_wr_dst_reg" signal is true, it checks if there's any unknown state in "W_wr_data". A warning message is printed with the time of detection whenever an unknown state is found in "W_wr_data".
